item.title: Major release coming soon
item.description: A major release of MINT will shortly be deployed, including: Estimates for Pyrethroid-pyrrole ITNs Strategize across region feature User interface refresh to make graphs and tables clearer and more consistent

item.title: About
item.description: MINT is an online tool is designed to help National Malaria Control Programs explore the most cost effective option of deploying current World Health Organisation (WHO) recommended mosquito net and IRS products for malaria control. It is available at: http://mint.dide.ic.ac.uk This “MINT News” site provides details of new releases of the MINT tool and associated estimates data.
